Description of the project¶

OC Lettings Site is a Django-based web application designed to manage property lettings. It is developed and maintained by Orange County Lettings, a startup in the real estate rental sector, currently expanding across the United States.

The project aims to enhance the current website’s architecture, improve code quality, and streamline deployment processes. Key features and goals include:

  • Modular Architecture: Refactoring the codebase into a more modular structure to improve maintainability and scalability.

  • Technical Debt Reduction: Addressing and resolving various technical debts to ensure a robust and efficient codebase.

  • CI/CD Pipeline: Implementing a Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipeline to automate testing, building, and deployment processes.

  • Error Monitoring: Integrating Sentry for application monitoring and error tracking.

  • Documentation: Creating comprehensive technical documentation using Sphinx and hosting it on Read the Docs.
